mapper.select: select mr.id, type, remind_link_id as remindLinkId, remind_position as remindPosition, mr.create_time as createTime, mr.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, f.file_path as userIconPath, CASE WHEN type = "news" THEN ( SELECT news_title FROM news WHERE id = mr.remind_link_id ) when type = "article" THEN ( SELECT article_name from article where id = mr.remind_link_id ) END AS remindLinkTitle from message_remind as mr left join user as u on mr.create_user = u.id left join files as f on f.id = u.user_icon_id where mr.status = "1" and mr.target_user_id = #{targetUserId} limit #{limit},#{offset}
select type,count(*) as count from message_remind as mr where mr.status = "1" and mr.target_user_id = #{targetUserId} GROUP BY type
